Name: Rolly's Adventure
About the game: Rolly's Adventure is a simple RPG where you defeat enemys and collect mystical cubes in order to restore peace to the kingdom. On your quest you will discover many pickups aiding your travels and providing a better gaming experience. Explore Explore the vast land, chat to NPCs and what on earth is on the other side of that mountain? Check out the towns, the locals might have something funny to say Collect Try to collect them all... There is over 100 of them to collect. The more you have the more you can get. Who knows... they might scare the boss. Battle The cubes are revolting. Quickly become a tank to protect yourself before they kill you. Watch out some of them can see you from a long way away.
